website_summaries.verdict: Low price makes these knee support pads a good option for newcomers to catching.
pros: Available in both youth and adult sizes
Features the 4-sided design that some catchers love, as it provides just a bit more padding at the back of the knee than a pointed wedge design
Padding will maintain its shape, even when the knee savers are used regularly
cons: Rectangle shaped loops are small, making it tough to attach the shin guards if you're in a hurry

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: youth size fits nicely for 10-13 year-old. easy to fit if loops break just use key chain rings, very well made. kids didn't like it at first but after a few innings behind the plate and no knee pain that tone changed really fast to, I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Great support & stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son has been catching for 2 years now and would sometimes complain of knee pain after really long games. These help him avoid the hyper-flexion of his knees to reduce the pain and also stay in place as he plays. He loves them and I have even recommend them for a friend. Our catching coach has not recommended catcher's knee supports in general as he feels it promotes a lack of muscle development of the legs and suggests weaning off the knee supports as my son's legs develop more.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Crafter

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was expected
customer_reviews.text: Before I continue, I do not have mine mounted on the bottom 2 straps, I have them 1 higher. Works better for my height and build, allows for a more comfortable squat. Helped greatly reduce stress to knees and fatigue in long innings, catching several bullpen sessions, BP, etc. Great value for money, would def buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Max Persons

customer_reviews.title: Great So Far
customer_reviews.text: Mid-way through season and kids are loving these. They seem to be of high quality so we expect they will hold up. Not overly bulky, helping out with comfort on the knees.
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Fits for my 10U softball player
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 10U softball player and she’s found them very helpful. I read reviews about people having trouble putting them on. We just added them on to her leg straps and she able to pop them off and on quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Briana S

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for catchers - well made and happy to give my son a little knee/leg relief.
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES having these. (Of course the coach says don't get used to them!) For his first year catching, I believe it has helped his legs and knees get used to the position and takes a little of the extra wear and tear off until he can get the muscles built up and memory into his legs. I am glad I made the purchase. These are sturdy and the clips are better than another brand that the league has used for the "team sets."
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, but reliable. Also comfortable and seems well made. It reduces the stress on the knees. Of course, no laces. Use those from the leg guards. I will make a new review after one year of intense use.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great knee savers would love to have used them but rings were to small to thread the catchers knee pad through to add to my sons uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Champion sports catchers knee support pads
customer_reviews.text: These catcher's pads are amazing! They really take the wear and tear out on your kid's knees. My son was like Dad my legs never got tired and my knees don't hurt at all after the game. I tried them on and I can tell you from my days of catching my generation and prior to were missing out! These things are amazing! Really comfortable! Amazon done a great job with the shipping got them in a day and a half with the prime membership! Thanks Amazon for your awesome service! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: N8tvprd

customer_reviews.title: Not good to keep the straps secure
customer_reviews.text: Would be a better product if it would allow straps to stay strapped. Many adjustments made but wouldn't allow leg straps to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: William J.

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son has to adjust them once in a while( slide to one side) but overall, great product, good support
customer_reviews.author: Darren - Long Island

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is in love with these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in love with these. She was so much more comfortable as soon as she wore them and they were very easy to add to her leg guards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knee pads
customer_reviews.text: Great knee pads. Bought these for my son. They really help to save the tension on his knees while playing catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Ash*

customer_reviews.title: Easy to attach
customer_reviews.text: Easy to attach, and they've made my 8-year-old daughter's life just a little bit more comfortable. Bought a second pair for the team. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit the leg guards
customer_reviews.text: Another set of supports with rings that are too small for standard catchers leg guard straps. Cant someone make just make a bigger ring that fits all?
customer_reviews.author: Condimented

customer_reviews.title: Could be a better fit
customer_reviews.text: They have a tendency to come loose. might be the shin guards that are attached to or might be a minor design flaw, overall a good price.
customer_reviews.author: CTJ

customer_reviews.title: More bounce and saves knees.
customer_reviews.text: Son said they felt good and did the job. The actual catchers gear was crappy so it kept coming off straps. But his knees are saved!
customer_reviews.author: Shepjeep

customer_reviews.title: get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: it's ok but not for long. maybe great for a summer league ball
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the kids on our team that play catcher. The fit well and are easy to use as the existing strap from the shin guards lace through and hold the supports in place. The catchers love them and say its so much more comfortable squatting now.
customer_reviews.author: Doc714

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: One season down... still holding strong! I even washed them... with some dawn and baking soda (I washed all of his gear to kill the smell and filth) Used a brush - like a nail brush but a little bigger) scrubbed it down, then rinsed it really good with the water hose - then sun dried... they looked new after the cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Mother Mayo

customer_reviews.title: Knee support
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 and these seem to be a bout difficult to keep in place. Seem like very good quality. Maybe he will grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my 7 year old son to use on his catchers gear. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S

customer_reviews.title: For my grandson's baseball team.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. He is 6 years and now he does not fall over when he gets up when he plays catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: Work Brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: My son caught all last year with no support. As he is 9 and loves catching, I bought these and put them on the team shin guards this year...to save his knees as he gets older. Both boys who catch for the team said the same thing. "These are great, I could stay here all day (in crouch position)". They don't inhibit movement or throws to second. Who ever invented these is a genius!
customer_reviews.author: Livenjoy

customer_reviews.title: Slide to the Side and Don’t Work Well
customer_reviews.text: They just don’t stay in place no matter how we fasten them in; they constantly shift to the side of his legs. He tried them two games and ended up going without them.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Saves the knees!
customer_reviews.text: My grand-daughter is a junior in College. She's only 5' tall and has been catching softball since she was 9 years old. Knee pads have saved her knees.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Gengler

customer_reviews.title: Great !
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied -- It makes a huge difference for my 13 yr old catcher.
customer_reviews.author: Marnic74

customer_reviews.title: It does its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 8 year old son. He played catcher and he wasn’t too fond with them at first. Once he noticed the difference with vs without them, he really likes them now!! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Howard

customer_reviews.title: ... to slide around a little bit but not that bad. might be doing something wrong but there was ...
customer_reviews.text: they tend to slide around a little bit but not that bad. might be doing something wrong but there was no instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to attach, only thing that could be improved is adding directions, we had to watch a video to get a general idea of how to attach them.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with my daughter’s catchers gear and she loves them!!
customer_reviews.author: MamaT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. My son's first year as catcher and these pads really we're a necessity. Would highly recommend

customer_reviews.title: This is just 1 knee support, not a pair.
customer_reviews.text: This is for 1 knee support. I was very disappointed when it came. I thought it would be for a pair, I don't know why anybody would want just one???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter who is a catcher for her softball team. These helped her respond quicker with getting up and she doesn’t complain how much her knees hurt after her games any more!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney etzler

customer_reviews.title: Helped my 10 year old catcher immensely
customer_reviews.text: The catcher on my softball team couldn't have been more thrilled when I showed up to practice with these!!! She has a noticeable jump in her game from that point on...they really do help with fatigue.

customer_reviews.title: My son went from being slow to get up to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son went from being slow to get up to very fast. word of caution... the other kids on the team will want to use them too and they will get lost etc... Also you need to buy straps as they are NOT included. I just bought velcro straps.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My son team was very happy and alot less then the local sport store

customer_reviews.text: Would recommend - 6-7 year olds used it for little league - from the smaller kids to the bigger kids - worked equally well for all. All kids that used it said it really helped and made crouching more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rylaarsdam

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is loving his position and this was what he needed due to being short.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Saves stress on your knees..
customer_reviews.text: Helps on saving the stress and fatigue on your knees and legs when playing catcher...good quality.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL J.

customer_reviews.title: She’s very good. But she needed some idiot for support for ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 10 years old and is a catcher. She’s very good. But she needed some thing to for support her legs. These have been great for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Not too big or small. This was perfect for my 10 year old. At times they did not stay buckled but my son got better at strapping them on over time.
customer_reviews.author: Honeysuckle3

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value!
customer_reviews.text: Grear product and best value for little league play. The loops work fine and as well as any other. There is no reason to pay twice the amount for other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plastic d-rings for straps may be an issue in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Please remember that this review is my husband and my opinions. These knee supports work great on the leg guards my husband had purchased (also on Amazon). These work well for him.

customer_reviews.title: junior  knee savers
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size. Needed woman's these were juniors. Did open them until July. ? Too late for refund?
customer_reviews.author: Regan

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the Knee S'ports brand to these. These ...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the Knee S'ports brand to these. These are more of a box-like shape and make it more diffcult for young adults to use.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I think these kneepads are must-have for young catcher. This particular brand was the cheapest I found on Amazon. The quality seems fine and I think they would holdup for a couple of kids as hand-me-downs.
customer_reviews.author: Jim McDonald

customer_reviews.title: To large
customer_reviews.text: Good quality; however, these are to long for youth shin guards. The straps won't go through both sets of loops.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D.

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Good knee savers. They move a bit more than the team gear sets did.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These attach to the leg guards and appear to work just like they should. Still too cold to really give them a work out, but have no reason to believe they will not work or hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: outstanding
customer_reviews.text: best all around for the price, and made of very good quality. Thicker than last years model. Will last for a couple of years.

customer_reviews.title: Work great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old team and the kids say they work very well. They said they are very comfortable and take a lot of the knee strain off.

customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with straps but was easily added to our catcher's leg guards.

customer_reviews.title: function wise, these are great
customer_reviews.text: These knee supports are very cushy, but they tend to slide a bit. We had a difficulty getting a good fit for my 10-year old daughter.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for the money!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect for my 16 year old. She loves them!

customer_reviews.text: these function exactly as expected. nothing fancy, but you really don't anything fancy for this sort of item. they've held up well over frequent use so far.

customer_reviews.title: ... to feed straps thru the loops but otherwise works great!
customer_reviews.text: White loops on back of the knee savers are small so I had to take the buckles off to feed straps thru the loops but otherwise works great!

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, saves knees.
customer_reviews.text: They fit well on the Easton Black Magic Catcher's gear set.

customer_reviews.title: Needs to always be adjusted.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Others should know that it needs to be adjusted constantly when playing.

customer_reviews.title: worked great.

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old softball catcher loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, helps my daughter stay comfortably in her squating position.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: bought for my 9 yr old and they are a great fit. easy to attach the straps to shin guards.

customer_reviews.title: catching baseballs for my ten year old super star
customer_reviews.text: good product. just wish they would stay in place. they have a tendencie to move around alot so you are always having to shift them around and put them back in place
customer_reviews.author: BIG G

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pieces, but did not come with thr straps to attach to the shin guards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our 10U softball star's gear and legs.
customer_reviews.author: C. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use along with a new set of teen/young adult catchers gear (15yo's). They work. They're knee savers. Every catcher should have these on his gear, it'll add years to the functionality of their knees (and in the short term, it keeps their legs fresh during the game as they can literally rest when in the catchers position a bit (so long as no one's on base!)
customer_reviews.author: Kragbax

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit cheap and they didn't fit the Rawlings standard shinguards that our little league uses.
customer_reviews.author: maeflyer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: MY 9 YEAR OLD DAUGHTER LOVED THESE JUST ;LIKE PREVIOUS REVIEWS IT IMPROVED HER GAME AND HELP HER LAST LONGER AS CATCHER...NOW AFTER USING THESE FOR A WHILE UNTIL HER LEGS GOT STRONGER SHE NO LONGER NEEDS THEM BUT THEY HELPED HER GET TO THAT POINT.NICE PRODUCT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: These knee savers fit perfectly on both sets of my gear. They are comfortable and provide great support!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Venango

customer_reviews.title: ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: these are supposed to be adult size but the attachment rings don't line up with the rings on a pair of adult shin guards. Still, they do the job with a little extra stretching of the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Zookarama

customer_reviews.title: We bought these for our 8 year old. They ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 8 year old. They are very hard with little give. She decided to not wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 10 year old daughter who "catches" for Fast pitch softball.....she loves them. they are comfortable and of great quality! Cheaper than any other places we looked before we bought them. Would definately recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Mtbrown

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my two boys needed to complete their catchers set. Fit my nine year old perfectly. I'm very happy with the knee savers.
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Dad

customer_reviews.title: but they work and seem like good
customer_reviews.text: Kind of awkward to keep on the shin guards, but they work and seem like good quality
customer_reviews.author: Eric D.

customer_reviews.title: Right size for youth and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's 9 year old team. They were the right size for 8 & 9 year olds and held up very well. The supports helped the catchers keep their bottoms up which helps with mobility and getting out of their crouch. My only caution is that the supports will limit how tight the shin guards can tightened. A catcher with very skinny legs may have trouble. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: W. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 5 year old catcher!
customer_reviews.text: He loves them and all the other catchers want to know where he got them! =) He thinks he is just like a major leaguer!
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for kids between 5 and 10 works awesome
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect for kids between 5 and 10 works awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Dj long

customer_reviews.title: No Straps Included - Requires additional catcher's gear
customer_reviews.text: These may be good knee saver pads but they require additional catchers gear to use. There are NO STRAPS INCLUDED. This may be obvious to most people, but it's not stated anywhere in product description and you will not be able to use these without additional equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Kintaro

customer_reviews.title: An awesome Champion Product and a great transaction!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the knee savers, they got here quickly and in great condition, and we are loving them. A++ transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen S. Mims

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says that all knee supports are dumb but I will force her to wear these because ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says that all knee supports are dumb but I will force her to wear these because I don't like her sassy mouth. I usually wait a minimum of six months before writing any review in order to fully test a product and its durability.
customer_reviews.author: The Steve

customer_reviews.title: Did the job, great price
customer_reviews.text: These worked great for our 6-8yo catchers. All the boys liked them with our Rawlings shin guards. My only complaint is that the D rings through which the straps pass are plastic.
customer_reviews.author: easy cheesy

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the other more famous brands that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was concerned these would not fit on Wilson leg guards because Wilson also makes their own knee savers. These fit fine and it saved me a few bucks too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan A.

customer_reviews.title: I think the full length ones would probably have been a better choice to go with
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the bum to attach to any pair of guards I have tried. Son 11y/o says, rather just not use any at all. I think the full length ones would probably have been a better choice to go with, idk, but these have been more of a pain to have them than not.
customer_reviews.author: tori j morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cannot beat the price, and they do just as well as bigger name-brnads!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: No clips to attach to shin pads :(
customer_reviews.text: These do not come with clips to attach the shin pads. Would have liked to know that upfront then we could have looked for another set with complete hardware.

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete!
customer_reviews.text: No straps were included. Really? That is an incomplete product, sorry.

customer_reviews.title: I like these knee supports but it came with no straps ...
customer_reviews.text: I like these knee supports but it came with no straps really people how am I sapost to put these on with my mind powers
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Unless you have a creative way to hold them in place....
customer_reviews.text: So they arrive, with places for straps to hold them on (look closely at the picture), but NO STRAPS. Guess you gotta read the fine print. Doesn't say comes with straps to hold them on. But the upshot is crazy glue is sold on Amazon, so there's that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These do exactly what they are called
customer_reviews.text: These truly help save on knee pain while catching!!! They could be a little more dense but overall great product.

customer_reviews.title: These are a little bulky for my 8 year old ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a little bulky for my 8 year old but trying them out. We may end up removing them.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses these knee savers during her softball practice and games. She is 8 years old and they fit her well.

product_meta.title: Champion Sports Catcher's Knee Support
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :1 x 1 x 1 inches; 4.16 Ounces
 * Item model number :LGKSY
 * Date First Available :July 1, 2003
 * Manufacturer :Champion Sports
 * ASIN :B0029VU6RA

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #12,724 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #3 inBaseball & Softball Knee Pads 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars378 ratings
feature_bullets: PREMIUM CATCHER'S KNEE SUPPORTS: Reduce pressure on knees and joints with these soft sport wedges
REDUCES STRESS & STRAIN ON KNEES: Creates a padded resting cushion between the thighs and calves
DURABLE ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Molded wedge shape retains its form even after months of avid use
SOFT SUPPORTIVE CUSHIONING: Lightweight cushioning still allows for a full range of movements
BEST FOR YOUTH ATHLETES: Champion Sports knee saver is best for youth players 5’7 inches and shorter
